subject: p12530259
History: Altered mental status. Evaluate for pneumonia.
Findings: In the left perihilar region, there is a hazy opacification consistent with pneumonia. There is no pulmonary edema, pleural effusion, or pneumothorax. The cardiomediastinal silhouette is normal. There is elevation of the left hemidiaphragm, which is stable from the prior exam.
Impression: Left perihilar pneumonia. Recommend followup radiographs after treatment to ensure resolution.
